title: Count Unique Characters of All Substrings of a Given String
content: Let's define a function that returns the number of unique characters on , for example if then , ,,, are the unique characters since they appear only once in , therefore . On this problem given a string we need to return the sum of where is a substring of . Notice that some substrings can be repeated so on this case you have to count the repeated ones too. Since the answer can be very large, return the answer modulo . contain upper-case English letters only.
